plot: A refugee boy from the war-torn Caucasus region in Southern Russia in the 1990's, falls in love with a Russian girl, Princess. Their respective gangs, set on religious and ethnic intolerance, stand in the way of their love.
title: Voyna Printsessy
plot_es: A refugee boy from the war-torn Caucasus region in Southern Russia in the 1990's, falls in love with a Russian girl, Princess. Their respective gangs, set on religious and ethnic intolerance, stand in the way of their love.
plot_en: A refugee boy from the war-torn Caucasus region in Southern Russia in the 1990's, falls in love with a Russian girl, Princess. Their respective gangs, set on religious and ethnic intolerance, stand in the way of their love.
